Project 1

Local real estate agent Charlie B. reached out to us after purchasing a new home for his family. The dental molding was tricky and needed caulking and a steady hand. We painted the main living areas of the home, and brought the dental molding back to its original beauty.

  • Client: Charlie B.
  • Date: November 2018
